attributes.action: Replace Theresa May and deliver a clean and prompt exit from the EU
attributes.background:
17.4 M voted in the largest ever UK referendum to leave the EU. it was clear that it meant 
1.Leaving the single market
2. Leaving the customs union 
3. Taking back control of laws & borders.
This government has a clear mandate to deliver on the referendum & make good it's manifesto commitments.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that call for someone to be given or lose their job. That includes Ministers and the Prime Minister.

You could sign this petition instead if it is something you would like to see happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220073
